formdata.value:
{
  "title": "Evening Desert Safari – Premium",
  "location": "Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve",
  "duration": "6 hours",
  "max_adult": 8,
  "child_min_age": 4,
  "pickup": "11:00 AM",
  "availability": {
    "start": "2025-09-03",
    "end": "2026-09-03"
  },
  "activity": ["Dune Bashing","Camel Ride","Quad Biking","Dune Buggy Ride"],
  "adultPrice": { "amount": 350, "currency": "AED" },
  "childPrice": { "amount": 250, "currency": "AED" },
  "single_sitter_dune_buggy": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "dune_buggy_ride": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "four_sitter_dune_buggy": { "amount": 900, "currency": "AED" },
  "quad_bike": { "amount": 300, "currency": "AED" },
  "camel_bike": { "amount": 120, "currency": "AED" },
  "tea_cofee_soft_drinks": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "hena_tattos": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "fire_show": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "arabic_costume": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "shisha_smoking": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "falcon_picture": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
 "sand_boarding": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "belly_dance": { "amount": 600, "currency": "AED" },
  "drop_off": "11:00 PM",
  "note": "Carry valid ID or passport; not recommended for guests with back problems.",
  "refund_policy": "Full refund if cancelled at least 24 hours before start time.",
  "included": [
    "Air-conditioned 4x4 pickup & drop-off",
    "Professional guide",
    "BBQ dinner with soft drinks",
    "Sandboarding equipment"
  ],
  "excluded": [
    "Personal expenses",
    "Alcoholic beverages",
    "Tips"
  ],
"discount":10,
  "tour_plan": [
    "15:00–15:30 Pickup from hotel",
    "16:30 Dune bashing & photo stop",
    "17:30 Sandboarding and camel ride",
    "19:00 BBQ dinner and live shows",
    "21:30 Drop-off to hotel"
  ],
  "description": "Premium evening desert safari with dune bashing, sandboarding, camel ride, live entertainment, and BBQ dinner. Optional add-ons include quad bike and dune buggy experiences."
}

  "bookingId": "68e9eab8960eb613357a0ebe",

  },

  "currency": "AED",
